subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: On courts all over the National Tennis Center, players shout, “Vamos!” “Allez!” and “Come on!” after painting lines with winners. Such interjections can also be heard just off the courts, as some of the sport’s most dedicated followers make their loyalties known.
